## <TrackAsiaGL.Style />
### Style is a component that automatically adds sources / layers to the map using TrackAsia Style Spec.<br/>Only [`sources`](https://trackasia.org/trackasia-gl-js-docs/style-spec/sources/) & [`layers`](https://trackasia.org/trackasia-gl-js-docs/style-spec/layers/) are supported.<br/>Other fields such as `sprites`, `glyphs` etc. will be ignored. Not all layer / source attributes from the style spec are supported, in general the supported attributes will be mentioned under https://github.com/track-asia/trackasia-react-native/tree/main/docs.<br/><br/>TODO: Maintainer forking this project does not understand the above comment regarding what is supported.

### props
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
| ---- | :--: | :-----: | :------: | :----------: |
| json | `TrackasiaJSON \| URL` | `none` | `false` | A JSON object conforming to the schema described in the TrackAsia Style Specification, or a URL to such JSON. |
